name: Blind Spot (itch) (amosfilho10000)
description: Welcome, players, to the newest 2D platform game: 'Blind Spot!' In this game, you need to use your sharp memory and platforming skills to overcome each stage in the dark. That's right, in the dark! But don't worry, you'll have a precious few seconds to memorize the path before the lights go out. Each stage presents unique challenges, from bouncy trampolines to tricky enemies. And don't forget about the sharp spikes that can be anywhere! So get ready to dive into the darkness and show off your memory and platforming skills in 'Blind Spot!' But remember, if you stumble and fall, the only thing you'll see is yourself at the beginning of the phase all over again! Good luck!"
